source.22dd68f4:
single   = data[(data.adults==1) & (data.children==0) & (data.babies==0)]
couple   = data[(data.adults==2) & (data.children==0) & (data.babies==0)]
family   = data[data.adults + data.children + data.babies > 2]


## Make the list of Category names, and their total percentage
names = ['Single', 'Couple (No Children)', 'Family / Friends']
count = [single.shape[0],couple.shape[0], family.shape[0]]
count_percent = [x/data.shape[0]*100 for x in count]


plt.figure(figsize=(8,6))
plt.bar(names, count_percent, color ='maroon',width = 0.4)
plt.ylabel("Booking %")
plt.title("Accommodation Type")
plt.show()
